column1: Kubu Raya Regency or Great Kubu Regency is a regency of West Kalimantan
column2: Indonesia.  It was created in 2007 from the (larger) central and southern part of Pontianak Regency. It covers an area of 6
column4: and at the 2010 Census it had a population of 500
column5: 970; the latest official estimate (for January 2014) is 518
column6: 116. The principal town lies at Sungai Raya
column7: directly adjacent to the City of Pontianak.

column1: The new Kubu Raya Regency consists of nine districts (kecamatan)
